The Life of Solina - The Royal Archives of Aden:
Solina was the princess of the blood of the kingdom of Elmoreden, the eldest sister of the last Emperor of Frintez and daughter of Bayum, the most powerful monarch after the great emperor Shunaiman. The people remember her, because she belongs to the royal family, for the first time in the history of the continent that brought dominance to the people of this land.
